name: Storm Blasters
description:
Storm Blasters is a co-op storm chasing shooter with vehicle combat. Shoot down the machines controlling the destructive storms ravaging the biodome.

This is a prototype of the vehicle mechanics, the storm FX, and the drone targets you can shoot down.

Controls
  • Move/Look/Zoom/Jump: WASD/Mouse/Scroll/Space
  • Switch Character Model: U
  • Enter Vehicle: Run into the seat you want
  • Exit Vehicle: F
  • Fire: Left Mouse Button
  • Switch Seat: Q
  • Cruise Control: C
  • Handbrake: Space
Hosting Multiplayer

This prototype has networked multiplayer. The host will need to forward port 7777. Port Forwarding Guide
